import React from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' import {Form,Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' const CourseScreen = () => { // destructure , :courseCode is rename const {id:courseId} =useParams(); //fetch course const course = courses.find((course)=>course._id===courseId) return ( <> GO BACK

{course.name}

{course.code}

{course.section}

{course.semester}

{course.description}

 ) } export default CourseScreen
